Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
11.09.2014 GB SCR19119 Added step 10, Step8: changed condition for call BMQ005
05.08.2013 SH SCR18325 Added PI.MANUALENTRY and extended step5/6 to set number debtros auto/manual
17.04.2013 SH SCR18104 Step2 Extended test to update DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC = 0 with ADMN_SUPPLYCHAINFINANCE = Y
22.01.2013 GB SCR17876 Step8: Added set DEBH_DELETIONBLOCKED = Y
24.12.2012 GB SCR17606 Step2: Changed value of update the DEBC_VERIFALLOWED
19.11.2012 SH SCR17606 Undo change (DEBC_VERIFALLOWED from v.BDC009.PO.DEBCFIELDS)
10.10.2012 GB SCR17606 Changed value of update the DEBC_VERIFALLOWED from v.BDC009.PO.DEBCFIELDS to blank in the Step 2
05.08.2011 SH SCR16670 Step2 Set DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC = 0 for RF
19.04.2011 GB SCR16390 Replaced GSET_MARKCODE by GSBU_MARKCODE
07.04.2011 SH SCR16359 Step9 Changed update TB19_UPDATEINVODEBB to N
15.03.2011 GB SCR16290 Added the Step 9 and the PI.LEGALOWNER
18.06.2010 GB SCR15595 Changed condition for update DEBC_DEBC in the Step 2
05.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
07.08.2009 SH SCR14795 Step 2 Added call BDC010 Determine handling user
13.07.2009 GB SCR14732 Added test if CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 2 then
set PO.DEBC_NO = 0 and end program
10.03.2009 SH SCR14267 Extended update DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC with
GSET_MARKCODE (GSET_ID =130) if PI.DEBH_NO = GSET_DEBH_NO (130)
09.09.2008 BG SCR13937 Added update field DEBC_LANGUAGE
31.07.2008 EMB SCR13842 Added extra user inform.
04.02.2008 SH SCR13357 Extended update of DEBC_HOFF_CODE_HANDLING with
CLNT203_OFFICE if DEBH_NO = GSET_DEBH_NO (GSET_ID = 130)
22.11.2007 SH SCR13158 Added BDC126.PI.CLHS_TEXT = null
06.11.2007 SH SCR13044 Added BDC126.PI.CLHS_NO = 0
11.10.007 SH SCR12987 Step2 Added update of DEBC address fields for dummy debtor
07.02.2007 SH SCR12292 Step3/4 are only performed now if there exists no
credit limit, so if 0/null
25.01.2007 SH Step 2: SCR12256 Added update DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC
and new step 7
10.11.2006 SH SCR12071 Added step 5 (Update CMON) /6 (Update CMOC)
on 23.12.2005 WJ SCR9853 set DEBC_DEBC_SORT
on 2.12.205 WJ SCR9666 update filed DEBC_CODECREFITLIMIT
09.11.2005 SH SCR9418 Changed updates/inits of Limit/Finance/Reinsurance limits
03.11.2005 SH SCR9403 Step4 Extended test to perfrom step with GSET_YESNO=N
where GSET_ID= 145
24.06.2005 SH SCR8540 Added new parameter PO.DEBC_NO, is updated with
DEBC_NO of new DEBC row
//11-04-2005 JP SCR 8113 extend updates on DEBC
02.09.2004 SH SCR6952 Added call to BDC009, relevant for updates of
DEBC_DIRECTPAYLETTER, DEBC_PAYDIFFLETTER, DEBC_VERIFYALLOWED
//26-08-2004 JP SCR #6892 add param in call to BDC126
26.07.2004 SH SCR6629 Added new arguemnts to list for BDC121 (p.TextCode2/3)
If CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 2 (END) then
set PO.DEBC_NO = 0 and end this program
-- Check for existing credit limit, if already exists step 3 and 4 have to be
skipped
... no credit limit exists
-- Step 3 Calculate new automatic credit limit
... check again for existing credit limit to perform step 4, could be exists now
because of BDC121
-- Step 4 Calculate new automatic finance limit
-- Step 5: Update CLIENT_MONTH
-- Step 6: Update CLIENT_MONTH_COUNTRY
-- Step 7: Inform users about new debtor
-- Step 8: Inform users for new SCF debtor (SCR13842)
-- Step 10: Inform users for new GRID-ID required ING Direct Spain
-- Step 9. Send introduction letter to new debtors
-- translations have to be done in client language
-- translations have to be done in client language
-- Update DEBC_MARKCODESPECIALACC
... markcode = 130 (no debtor details)
... no special markcode in case of Reverse Factoring and ...
